description:
The job title is SDE Intern, and the description is as follows: 

This SDE Intern position is a remote role where the successful candidate will have the opportunity to work with a talented team of developers. The main responsibility will include developing and maintaining high-quality web/mobile applications using the MERN stack, while providing peer code reviews, bug fixes, feature development, and product enhancement suggestions. Skills used includes MongoDB, ReactJS, JavaScript, Web Development, NodeJS.. The skills required for the job are MongoDB, ReactJS, JavaScript, Web Development, NodeJS.
